page.title: 14COMMUINCATIONS
page.content: The phone is a good idea but there is one thing I don't like and that is the bill! Some people deserve the price. My mom does. She's on the phone from one o'clock until we come home, and even longer. My dad is not like that on the phone. Just a quick hello and a quick goodbye. I write to all the family. I write to my aunts and uncles, my nans and grandads and they all write back. Sometimes I write a special thank you letter for when the look after us. The same as when we go on holiday. I always send my relatives a postcard saying what it's like and how the weather is. There is another way of keeping in touch and that is by C.B. radio. I used to have a radio and I would listen to them speaking. I know a girl's name Rosebush and another, Nescafe
